qas.question: What country did Kerry discuss with Parolin?
What did the Pope express support for in Jan 2014?
How many people did Kerry say had died in Syria as of Jan 2014?

context: In January 2014, having met with Secretary of State, <a0_0>Archbishop Pietro Parolin<a0_0/>, Kerry said "We touched on just about every major issue that we are both working on, that are issues of concern to all of us. First of all, we talked at great length about <a1_0>Syria<a1_0/>, and I was particularly appreciative for the Archbishop’s raising this issue, and equally grateful for the Holy Father’s comments – the Pope's comments yesterday regarding his support for <a2_0>the Geneva II process<a2_0/>. We welcome that support. It is very important to have broad support, and I know that the Pope is particularly concerned about the massive numbers of displaced human beings and the violence that has taken <a3_0>over 130,000<a3_0/> lives".
